titles: A proclamation discharging forraign copper-coyn to be imported or made use of in this kingdom
author: Scotland. Privy Council.
Scotland. Sovereign (1685-1688 : James VII)
publisher: Printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson, Printer to his most sacred Majesty,
notes: "...discharging forraign copper-coyn to be imported or made use of in this kingdom" in ms.; additional ms. notes.
Dated: Given under Our Signet at Edinburgh, the twentieth day of May one thousand six hundred eighty six years. And of Our Reign the second year.
Signed: Will. Paterson, Cls. Sti. Concilii.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
